title: Blueprint Schema
description: Use this schema for creating new blueprints or updating existing blueprints.

blueprint_type.description: Type of blueprint, either OCI-provided or community-contributed.

blueprint_title.description: Title of the blueprint. Users see this in the portal and in GitHub docs.

blueprint_short_description.description: Short 100-150 character description of the blueprint. Users see this in the Blueprints List screen on the portal and in GitHub docs.

blueprint_long_description.description: Longer 250-500 word description of the blueprint. Users see this in the Blueprint Detail screen on the portal and in GitHub docs.
